comments.name: remarks
comments.value:
Finds the location of the closest biome of a particular type.
Note that the findClosestBiome operation can take some time to complete, so avoid using many of these calls within a particular tick.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Starting location to look for a biome to find.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Identifier of the biome to look for.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Additional selection criteria for a biome search.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: Returns a location of the biome, or undefined if a biome could not be found.
